description.value:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You witnessed a creature deal damage to an ally within 30 feet since your last turn.

After seeing an enemy harm one of your allies, you deliver a righteous shout in the name of the celestial Talmandor. Attempt an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize], comparing the result to the Will DC of each enemy within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]; this Demoralize attempt doesn't take any penalty for not sharing a language. It's possible to get a different degree of success for each target.
